titleStmt.title: S. Augustines manuel Conteining special, and piked meditations, and godlie praiers: drawne out of the Word of God, and writings of the holie Fathers, for the exercise of the soule. Corrected, translated, and adorned, by Thomas Rogers.
Manuale. English.
titleStmt.author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.
Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Pater noster rowe, at the signe of the Starre. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Probably not in fact by Augustine.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures A-E¹² .
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater noster rowe, at the signe of the Starre. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis
